    • turnEndCallback

      Fires on every turn end and at the start of t he game.

    • drawCardCallback

      void drawCardCallback​(Card card, boolean isPlayable)
      Fires everytime a card is drawn from the deck
      Parameters:
      card - card drawn from deck
      isPlayable - true if card is playable else false

    • drawingCallback

      void drawingCallback​(Card[] cards, GameController.IGameController.continueDraw cDraw)
      Called when current player is drawing 2 cards
      Parameters:
      cards - cards that are being drawn from deck
      cDraw - callback to continue the turn (usually skips it)

      Parameters:
